title: Diablo III: Rise of the Necromancer Website

images.alt: Rise of the Necromancer: Book Cover

body: This is the announcement site for Rise of the Necromancer, an expansion for Diablo III. I’m very proud of this one because it’s much more than just a brochure, it’s an interactive experience that really ties into the world of the game.
It also makes heavy use of CSS3 animation for a page-turning effect, and despite being heavily textured, it is (mostly) optimized for high-resolution screens and it scales to fit screens of any size.
